Package fr.ens.biologie.codeGeneration

Class Comments

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ens.biologie.codeGeneration.Comments
  • public class Comments
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for defining generic comments in generated code files.
    Author:
    Jacques Gignoux - 19 d√©c. 2014

      • copyright

        public static java.lang.String[] copyright​(int year,
                                           java.lang.String... authors)
        Generate a copyright comment
        Parameters:
        year - year of authorship
        authors - list of author names
        Returns:
        the generated comment

      • generatedCode

        public static java.lang.String[] generatedCode​(boolean editable,
                                               java.lang.String model,
                                               java.lang.String version)
        Generate a 'generated code' notice at the beginning of a class file.
        Parameters:
        editable - true if this code can be edited, false if it must stay as is
        model - name of the generated piece of code (called a 'Model')
        version - version number
        Returns:
        a comment including an edition warning and a time stamp indicating when this comment was generated

      • classComment

        public static java.lang.String[] classComment​(java.lang.String className)
        Generate a class comment, e.g. "Class myClass"
        Parameters:
        className - the class name
        Returns:
        the cgenerated omment

      • comment

        public static java.lang.String comment​(java.lang.String[]... strings)
        Generate a header comment, ie enclosed by /* ... */
        Parameters:
        strings - the lines inside the comment block
        Returns:
        the full comment as a String

      • javaDocComment

        public static java.lang.String javaDocComment​(java.lang.String indent,
                                              java.lang.String[]... strings)
        Generate a header comment, ie enclosed by /* ... */
        Parameters:
        indent - the String used for indentation at the start of comment lines
        strings - the lines inside the comment block
        Returns:
        the full comment as a String

      • singleLineComment

        public static java.lang.String singleLineComment​(java.lang.String[]... strings)
        Generate a single line comment, ie starting with //
        Parameters:
        strings - the lines to comment
        Returns:
        the full comment as a String
